TopologyPy
  • API Reference
  • View page source

API Reference

This section documents the main modules and classes of the TopologyPy package, which provides tools for computing CMB covariance matrices for non-trivial topologies (E1–E10). The package includes a base Topology class, topology-specific implementations, and utility functions.

Main Interface

run_topology.py

Main interface for the TopologyPy package to run CMB covariance matrix computations for non-trivial topologies. Supports both programmatic and command-line usage.

topology.run_topology.run_topology(topology, l_max, l_min=2, do_polarization=False, number_of_a_lm_realizations=1, l_range=None, lp_range=None, **topology_params)[source]

Run covariance matrix computation for a specified topology.

This function is the primary interface for the TopologyPy package, allowing users to compute CMB covariance matrices for various topologies. It loads default parameters from the topology’s parameter file and updates them with provided topology-specific and general parameters. Invalid parameters (not present in the default parameter file) raise an error.

Parameters:

  • topology (str) – Topology type (e.g., ‘E1’, ‘E2’, …, ‘E8’).

  • l_max (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • l_min (int, optional) – Minimum multipole. Defaults to 2.

  • do_polarization (bool, optional) – Whether to include polarization in calculations. Defaults to False.

  • number_of_a_lm_realizations (int, optional) – Number of a_lm realizations. Defaults to 1.

  • l_range (np.ndarray, optional) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max]. If None, defaults to [[l_min, l_max]].

  • lp_range (np.ndarray, optional) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max]. If None, defaults to [[l_min, l_max]].

  • **topology_params – Topology-specific parameters (e.g., Lx, Ly, Lz for E1; LAx, LAy for E7). Must match keys in the default parameter file for the topology.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If an invalid parameter is provided or the topology is unsupported.

  • ImportError – If the parameter file for the topology is not found.

Example

>>> from topology.run_topology import run_topology
>>> run_topology('E1', l_max=30, Lx=1.0, Ly=1.0, Lz=1.0, beta=90, alpha=90, do_polarization=True)
>>> run_topology('E6', l_max=20, Lx=1.0, Ly=1.0, Lz=1.0, r_x=0.5, r_y=0.5, r_z=0.5)
>>> run_topology('E7', l_max=20, LAx=1.0, LAy=1.0, L1y=1.0, L2x=1.0, L2z=1.0)
topology.run_topology.main()[source]

Command-line interface for TopologyPy.

Base Topology Class

topology.py

Base class for computing CMB covariance matrices for non-trivial topologies. Implements preprocessing, CAMB integration, transfer function interpolation, spherical harmonics computation, and covariance matrix calculations.

class topology.src.topology.Topology(param, debug=True, make_run_folder=True)[source]

Bases: object

Base class for CMB covariance matrix computation in non-trivial topologies.

param

Configuration parameters (e.g., topology, l_max, c_l_accuracy).

Type:

dict

topology

Topology type (e.g., ‘E1’).

Type:

str

l_max

Maximum multipole.

Type:

int

l_min

Minimum multipole.

Type:

int

c_l_accuracy

Accuracy for wavevector cutoff (e.g., 0.99).

Type:

float

C_l_type_array

Array of correlation types [‘TT’, ‘EE’, ‘TE’].

Type:

np.ndarray

do_polarization

Whether to compute polarization (EE, TE).

Type:

bool

Initialize the Topology class with simulation parameters.

Parameters:

  • param (dict) – Parameters including topology, l_max, l_min, c_l_accuracy, do_polarization, etc.

  • debug (bool, optional) – Enable debug output. Defaults to True.

  • make_run_folder (bool, optional) – Create output directories. Defaults to True.

do_pre_processing()[source]

Perform preprocessing for covariance matrix computation.

Sets up CAMB parameters, computes transfer functions, primordial power spectrum, and spherical harmonics, optimizing for memory efficiency.

calculate_c_lmlpmp(normalize=False, plot_param={})[source]

Compute the CMB covariance matrix C_lmlpmp.

Parameters:

  • normalize (bool, optional) – Normalize the covariance matrix. Defaults to False.

  • plot_param (dict, optional) – Parameters for plotting (e.g., l_ranges, lp_ranges).

Returns:

Covariance matrix C_lmlpmp.

Return type:

np.ndarray

plot_cov_matrix(normalize=False, C_l_type=3)[source]

Plot the covariance matrix.

Parameters:

  • normalize (bool, optional) – Plot normalized matrix. Defaults to False.

  • C_l_type (int, optional) – Correlation type (0: TT, 1: EE, 2: TE, 3: All). Defaults to 3.

do_cov_sub_plot(ax, normalize, ax_index, C_order, ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Create a subplot for the covariance matrix.

Parameters:

  • ax (matplotlib.axes.Axes) – Subplot axes.

  • normalize (bool) – Use normalized data.

  • ax_index (int) – Subplot index.

  • C_order (np.ndarray) – Covariance matrix data.

  • ell_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max].

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

Returns:

Image object for colorbar.

Return type:

matplotlib.image.AxesImage

get_kmax_as_function_of_ell(scalar_power)[source]

Compute wavevector cutoffs k_max as a function of multipole ell.

Parameters:

scalar_power (callable) – Primordial power spectrum function from CAMB.

Return type:

np.ndarray

get_sph_harm()[source]

Compute spherical harmonics without phase(phi=0) using multiprocessing.

Stores results in self.sph_harm_no_phase.

get_c_lmlpmp_multiprocessing(ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Compute covariance matrix using multiprocessing.

Parameters:

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

Returns:

Covariance matrix C_lmlpmp.

Return type:

np.ndarray

Topology Implementations

E1.py

Implementation of the E1 topology (3-torus) for CMB covariance matrix computation. Extends the base Topology class with E1-specific wavevector generation and covariance calculations.

class topology.src.E1.E1(param, debug=True, make_run_folder=False)[source]

Bases: Topology

Type:

float

Type:

bool

Initialize the E1 topology.

Parameters:

  • param (dict) – Parameters including Lx, Ly, Lz, alpha, beta, gamma, l_max.

  • debug (bool, optional) – Enable debug output. Defaults to True.

  • make_run_folder (bool, optional) – Create output directories. Defaults to False.

get_c_lmlpmp_per_process_multi(process_i, return_dict, min_ell, max_ell, V, k_amp, phi, theta_unique_index, k_amp_unique_index, k_max_list, l_max, lm_index, sph_harm_no_phase, integrand, ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Compute covariance matrix for a process in multiprocessing. This function seems unnecessary, but Numba does not allow return_dict which is of type multiprocessing.Manager

Args:

process_i (int): Process index. return_dict (multiprocessing.Manager.dict): Shared dictionary for results. min_ell (int): Minimum multipole for this process. max_ell (int): Maximum multipole for this process. V (float): Volume of the fundamental domain. k_amp (np.ndarray): Wavevector magnitudes. phi (np.ndarray): Wavevector azimuthal angles. theta_unique_index (np.ndarray): Indices for unique theta. k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray): Indices for unique k_amp. k_max_list (np.ndarray): Wavevector cutoffs. l_max (int): Maximum multipole. lm_index (np.ndarray): Spherical harmonic indices. sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray): Spherical harmonics without phase. integrand (np.ndarray): Preprocessed integrand. ell_range (np.ndarray): Multipole range [l_min, l_max]. ell_p_range (np.ndarray): Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

topology.src.E1.get_c_lmlpmp(min_ell, max_ell, V, k_amp, phi, theta_unique_index, k_amp_unique_index, k_max_list, l_max, lm_index, sph_harm_no_phase, integrand, ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Compute covariance matrix for polarization (TT, EE, TE).

Parameters:

  • min_ell (int) – Minimum multipole.

  • max_ell (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • V (float) – Volume of the fundamental domain.

  • k_amp (np.ndarray) – Wavevector magnitudes.

  • phi (np.ndarray) – Wavevector azimuthal angles.

  • theta_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique theta.

  • k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique k_amp.

  • k_max_list (np.ndarray) – Wavevector cutoffs.

  • l_max (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • lm_index (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonic indices.

  • sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonics without phase.

  • integrand (np.ndarray) – Preprocessed integrand.

  • ell_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max].

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

Returns:

Covariance matrix (TT, EE, TE).

Return type:

np.ndarray

topology.src.E1.get_c_TT_lmlpmp(min_ell, max_ell, V, k_amp, phi, theta_unique_index, k_amp_unique_index, k_max_list, l_max, lm_index, sph_harm_no_phase, integrand, ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Compute covariance matrix for temperature (TT) only.

Parameters:

  • min_ell (int) – Minimum multipole.

  • max_ell (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • V (float) – Volume of the fundamental domain.

  • k_amp (np.ndarray) – Wavevector magnitudes.

  • phi (np.ndarray) – Wavevector azimuthal angles.

  • theta_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique theta.

  • k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique k_amp.

  • k_max_list (np.ndarray) – Wavevector cutoffs.

  • l_max (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • lm_index (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonic indices.

  • sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonics without phase.

  • integrand (np.ndarray) – Preprocessed integrand.

  • ell_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max].

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

Returns:

TT covariance matrix.

Return type:

np.ndarray

Implementation of the E2 topology (half-turn) for CMB covariance matrix computation. Extends the base Topology class with E2-specific wavevector generation and covariance calculations.

get_c_lmlpmp_per_process_multi(process_i, return_dict, min_index, max_index, V, k_amp, phi, theta_unique_index, k_amp_unique_index, k_max_list, l_max, lm_2_index, sph_harm_no_phase, integrand, ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Compute covariance matrix for a process in multiprocessing. This function seems unnecessary, but Numba does not allow return_dict which is of type multiprocessing.Manager

Args:

process_i (int): Process index. return_dict (multiprocessing.Manager.dict): Shared dictionary for results. min_ell (int): Minimum multipole for this process. max_ell (int): Maximum multipole for this process. V (float): Volume of the fundamental domain. k_amp (np.ndarray): Wavevector magnitudes. phi (np.ndarray): Wavevector azimuthal angles. theta_unique_index (np.ndarray): Indices for unique theta. k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray): Indices for unique k_amp. k_max_list (np.ndarray): Wavevector cutoffs. l_max (int): Maximum multipole. lm_index (np.ndarray): Spherical harmonic indices. sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray): Spherical harmonics without phase. integrand (np.ndarray): Preprocessed integrand. ell_range (np.ndarray): Multipole range [l_min, l_max]. ell_p_range (np.ndarray): Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

get_c_lmlpmp_per_process_multi(process_i, return_dict, min_index, max_index, V, k_amp, phi, theta_unique_index, k_amp_unique_index, k_max_list, l_max, lm_2_index, wigner_d_l_m_2, integrand, ell_range, ell_p_range)[source]

Compute covariance matrix for a process in multiprocessing. This function seems unnecessary, but Numba does not allow return_dict which is of type multiprocessing.Manager

Args:

process_i (int): Process index. return_dict (multiprocessing.Manager.dict): Shared dictionary for results. min_ell (int): Minimum multipole for this process. max_ell (int): Maximum multipole for this process. V (float): Volume of the fundamental domain. k_amp (np.ndarray): Wavevector magnitudes. phi (np.ndarray): Wavevector azimuthal angles. theta_unique_index (np.ndarray): Indices for unique theta. k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray): Indices for unique k_amp. k_max_list (np.ndarray): Wavevector cutoffs. l_max (int): Maximum multipole. lm_index (np.ndarray): Spherical harmonic indices. sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray): Spherical harmonics without phase. integrand (np.ndarray): Preprocessed integrand. ell_range (np.ndarray): Multipole range [l_min, l_max]. ell_p_range (np.ndarray): Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

E4.py

Implementation of the E4 topology (third-turn) for CMB covariance matrix computation. Extends the base Topology class with E2-specific wavevector generation and covariance calculations.

class topology.src.E4.E4(param, debug=True, make_run_folder=False)[source]

Bases: Topology

E4 topology (quater-turn) for CMB covariance matrix computation.

L12

Length scale in square base (Mpc).

Type:

float

Lz

Length scale in z-direction (Mpc).

Type:

float

alpha

Angle alpha in radians.

Type:

float

beta

Angle beta in radians.

Type:

float

gamma

Angle gamma in radians.

Type:

float

V

Volume of the fundamental domain.

Type:

float

cubic

True if LA = Lz and alpha = beta = 90 degrees.

Type:

bool

Initialize the E4 topology.

Parameters:

  • param (dict) – Parameters including L12, Lz, alpha, beta, l_max.

  • debug (bool, optional) – Enable debug output. Defaults to True.

  • make_run_folder (bool, optional) – Create output directories. Defaults to False.

Compute covariance matrix for polarization (TT, EE, TE).

Parameters:

  • min_ell (int) – Minimum multipole.

  • max_ell (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • V (float) – Volume of the fundamental domain.

  • k_amp (np.ndarray) – Wavevector magnitudes.

  • phi (np.ndarray) – Wavevector azimuthal angles.

  • theta_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique theta.

  • k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique k_amp.

  • k_max_list (np.ndarray) – Wavevector cutoffs.

  • l_max (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • lm_index (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonic indices.

  • sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonics without phase.

  • integrand (np.ndarray) – Preprocessed integrand.

  • ell_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max].

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

Returns:

Covariance matrix (TT, EE, TE).

Return type:

np.ndarray

Returns the index corresponding to (l, m) in an array describing alm up.

Parameters: - l_min (int): The minimum l, defines the alm layout. - l (int): The l for which to get the index. - m (int): The m for which to get the index.

Returns: - idx (int): The index corresponding to (l, m).

Compute covariance matrix for polarization (TT, EE, TE).

Parameters:

  • min_ell (int) – Minimum multipole.

  • max_ell (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • V (float) – Volume of the fundamental domain.

  • k_amp (np.ndarray) – Wavevector magnitudes.

  • phi (np.ndarray) – Wavevector azimuthal angles.

  • theta_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique theta.

  • k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique k_amp.

  • k_max_list (np.ndarray) – Wavevector cutoffs.

  • l_max (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • lm_index (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonic indices.

  • sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonics without phase.

  • integrand (np.ndarray) – Preprocessed integrand.

  • ell_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max].

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

topology.src.tools_E2_E3_E4_E5.E2_E3_E4_E5_get_c_TT_lmlpmp(min_ell, max_ell, V, k_amp, phi, theta_unique_index, k_amp_unique_index, k_max_list, l_max, lm_index, sph_harm_no_phase, integrand, ell_range, ell_p_range, tilde_xi, tilde_xi_delta_m)[source]

Compute covariance matrix for temperature (TT) only.

Parameters:

  • min_ell (int) – Minimum multipole.

  • max_ell (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • V (float) – Volume of the fundamental domain.

  • k_amp (np.ndarray) – Wavevector magnitudes.

  • phi (np.ndarray) – Wavevector azimuthal angles.

  • theta_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique theta.

  • k_amp_unique_index (np.ndarray) – Indices for unique k_amp.

  • k_max_list (np.ndarray) – Wavevector cutoffs.

  • l_max (int) – Maximum multipole.

  • lm_index (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonic indices.

  • sph_harm_no_phase (np.ndarray) – Spherical harmonics without phase.

  • integrand (np.ndarray) – Preprocessed integrand.

  • ell_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [l_min, l_max].

  • ell_p_range (np.ndarray) – Multipole range [lp_min, lp_max].

Returns:

TT covariance matrix.

Return type:

np.ndarray
